domain_aliases.title: Domain Aliases
domain_aliases.description: Adds an alias domain. If a request with the hostname (FQDN) matching the hostname in the alias is found, that URL is used as the base URL.

match_domain.title: Matching Domain
match_domain.description: Sets the matching domain. If the domain matches with this entry, the accompanying base_url will be used.

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: Sets the scheme, for example https or http.

base_path.title: Base Path
base_path.description: Sets the base path for the matched domain.
